parameters.name: CidrIp
parameters.description: The CIDR block or IP address that is allowed to access the VNC service. This parameter is used to assign a security group to the E-HPC cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

You can call the [ListClusters](~~87116~~) operation to query the cluster ID.

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The fixed port. Set the value to 12016.
